personalWorkouts.title: AI-Powered Personalized Workouts

realTimeFeedback.title: Real-Time Form Correction
realTimeFeedback.description: Our AI technology analyzes your movements to provide instant feedback and improve your technique.

progressTracking.title: Smart Progress Tracking
progressTracking.description: Track your fitness journey with detailed analytics and AI-driven insights for continuous improvement.

nutrition.title: Nutrition Guidance
nutrition.description: Receive AI-optimized meal suggestions that complement your workout routine and fitness goals.

testimonials.aiSuggestion2: With real-time feedback, I can instantly correct my form.
